title: bug splat with every game
body: i can queue up for a game all willy nilly but getting in to the game is impossible no matter what i even do i keep getting bug splatted, not only is this frustrating its killing my ranked and any other mode i play i would like to not get banned for something this stupid that's not even on my end of things please fix this

replies.body:
Bugsplats are caused by a number of different factors, with the most common being problems with system drivers or problematic windows settings. I'd like you to work through our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to ensure this can't be resolved with one of the common solutions.

Let me know if this caused any change.
